informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, vehicle information, and diagnostic data.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to personalize your experience with IntelliScan.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our services, conducting business, or serving our users.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@intelliscan.app.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Learn the basics of using IntelliScan

vehicleSetup.title: Vehicle Setup
vehicleSetup.description: How to add and configure your vehicles

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do I connect to my vehicle's OBD port?
faq.answer1: Locate your vehicle's OBD port (usually under the dashboard), plug in your OBD adapter, and connect via Bluetooth through the app.
faq.question2: How often should I run diagnostics?
faq.answer2: We recommend running diagnostics monthly or before long trips to ensure your vehicle is in optimal condition.
faq.question3: What do the diagnostic codes mean?
faq.answer3: Each diagnostic code indicates a specific issue with your vehicle. Our app provides detailed explanations for each code.

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.subheader: We're here to help! Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for contacting support. We'll get back to you soon.
